channel.title: News on Emilie Yu
channel.description: Recent content in News on Emilie Yu

item.title: I will be demo-ing our work on modular crochet textiles at DIS 2025 along with Ashley Del Valle: come see garments made with our computational system, and try your fine motor skills on our manual assembly technique.
I will present my work at the SIGCHI Paris Chapter in Saclay on July 1st.
I'll be organizing the SIGGRAPH 2025 Birds of Feather on Sustainable Research in Computer Graphics along with Felix HÃ¤hnlein. Please join us Tuesday Aug 12, 4PM. Everyone is welcome!
I'm excited to be part of a SIGGRAPH 2025 Course on Computational Craft! Wednesday Aug. 13, 2-5PM. Come check out cool craft objects, and learn how to apply CG research to craft fabrication.
I will be at SIGGRAPH 2025 to present a talk on surveying GPU usage in graphics papers with a sustainability lens.
Our paper on modular crochet granny square garments has been conditionally accepted to DIS 2025!
I served on the DIS Pictorials Committee.
I presented my dissertation work at the yearly French Computer Graphics conference JFIG 2024.
I served on the TEI Papers Committee.
